name: Brandy Sites
author: YayCommerce

sections.description:
Brandy Sites is made to create stunning, professional websites faster than ever before.

It works perfectly with the Brandy theme.

Features

Here’s why you and your customers will love Brandy Sites:

  • Human-Centered Design Philosophy: We go beyond aesthetics. Brandy Sites empowers you to build websites that understand your customers’ needs and guide them towards conversion.
  • Unique Design Library: Choose from a curated selection of modern, on-trend designs that reflect the latest aesthetics while remaining fully customizable.
  • Seamless Integration: Works flawlessly with WooCommerce and your existing WordPress environment.
  • Mobile-Responsive: Ensure your website looks beautiful on any device, from desktops to smartphones and tablets. Our goal is to make your customers shop on the go!
  • Lightweight and Fast: Brandy Sites keeps your website loading speed optimal for a super smooth user experience.

With Brandy Sites, you can create various types of websites:

  • Ecommerce websites to quickly sell products online.
  • Landing pages to showcase specific products or services, perfect for capturing leads and conversions.
  • Agency websites to attract new clients through a clean and professional home page.
  • Membership websites to create a gated community or sell subscription-based services.
  • Portfolios to showcase your skills and experience, as well as allow potential clients to easily schedule appointments.
  • And a lot more!
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from wordpress.org
  2. From your WordPress admin dashboard, go to Plugins > Add New, and upload the plugin’s zip file
  3. Install and activate it
  4. After activating, you will be able to import sample sites quickly from the Brandy dashboard.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin working with Gutenberg?

A big yes! It works seamlessly with Gutenberg, so you don’t have to use any extra page builder plugin.

I have issues with the plugin. How can I get support?

Please create a support topic or chat with us to get help. To quickly get the answers, please provide us with as much information as possible. Rest assured that your conversation is private, and your information remains credentialed.
sections.changelog:
Aug 19, 2024 – Version 1.1.4

  • Added: Reset editor global styles after importing site
  • Added: Translations to pattern
  • Updated: Replace columns layout “full width” by Row direction (Footer builder)
  • Updated: Synchronize mini cart and cart events when using WooCommerce blocks
  • Fixed: Wishlist session
  • Fixed: Cannot preview posts/pages which have status draft/future
  • Fixed: Cannot add to cart in single page when product is variable/grouped
  • Fixed: Issue with resetting template

Aug 4, 2024 – Version 1.1.3

  • Added: E-Book site
  • Updated: Widgets in patterns

Jul 30, 2024 – Version 1.1.2

  • Added: Bookstore starter site
  • Added: Demo Images
  • Added: Create product template pattern + product collection patterns

Jul 26, 2024 – Version 1.1.1

  • Updated: Template content
  • Updated: Sample patterns + Shoes templates

Jul 25, 2024 – Version 1.1

  • Added: New templates

1.0

  • Version 1.0 Initial Release

short_description: Build beautiful ecommerce websites in minutes, no coding needed.
